title: Implement hierarchical layout for Kiro resources
description: Use hierarchical layout mode for Kiro: {sink}/arm/{registry}/{package}/{version}/{file}. Same pattern as Cursor and Amazon Q. Depends on: ai-resource-manager-61v

title: Update sink configuration to support Kiro tool
description: Add Kiro as valid tool option in cmd/arm/main.go and internal/arm/sink/manager.go. Support default paths: .kiro/steering/ for rulesets, .kiro/prompts/ for promptsets. Depends on: ai-resource-manager-swu

title: Add Kiro tool support and refactor Amazon Q compiler
Update documentation for Kiro CLI support
description: Update README.md, docs/concepts.md, docs/sinks.md, docs/commands.md with Kiro examples and configuration. Add E2E tests for Kiro compilation. Depends on: ai-resource-manager-swu, ai-resource-manager-61v, ai-resource-manager-vi3, ai-resource-manager-37l

title: Implement priority index generation for Kiro steering
description: Generate arm_index.md for rulesets in .kiro/steering/ using same priority resolution logic as other tools. Format as standard markdown with priority ordering. Depends on: ai-resource-manager-61v
